headline: GE Vernova Celebrates The Season of Giving with Holiday ‘Innovators Toy Land’ Pop-Up at Rockefeller Center and Launch of Global STEM Toy Drive
summary: CAMBRIDGE, Mass., December 02, 2025--This holiday season, GE Vernova celebrates the power of giving and creativity through two uplifting events: the transformation of Rockefeller Center into Innovators Toy Land and the launch of a global Innovators Toy Drive.

content.title: GE Vernova Celebrates The Season of Giving with Holiday ‘Innovators Toy Land’ Pop-Up at Rockefeller Center and Launch of Global STEM Toy Drive
